properties.body:
GULF OF GUINEA.
EQUATORIAL GUINEA.
DNC 01.
1. M/V ATTACKED IN 03-45.56N 008-14.10E AT
   200420Z NOV. VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP
   CLEAR OF THIS POSITION AND TO EXERCISE
   EXTREME CAUTION.
   REPORTS TO NAVAREA II,
   PHONE: 332 9822 8888, 332 5631 2424,
   FAX: 332 5631 2584,
   E-MAIL: WATCHKEEPERS@MDAT-GOG.ORG,
   coord.navarea2@shom.fr.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 271015Z NOV 19.
